name: Beauty Shooter
description:
Welcome to the world of Beauty Shooter.

In this world you will meet:

delicate princesses, flamboyant girls, samurai warriors, proud sisters saints, hot bunny girls, and charming swimsuit girls.

The demon controlled the body of the girl, defeat the demons to save them.

Game features:

This is a "beauty girl + casual + shooting" game.
The bullets fired will become bigger and stronger after eating radishes.
After eating the radish, click the right mouse button to release the explosive power, which is huge.
In the game, each character has several CGs, and some content continues to increase.
Existing CG: 18 ordinary CG, 12 18+CG, 12 costumes, 6 characters




new CGs can be used after customs clearance
